mailSubject: Confirmation of Checklist Update for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
mailBody:
Dear Shubham,

I hope this message finds you well.

I would like to confirm that the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32) has been successfully updated. The latest information has been incorporated, including the PEP screening data as per the attachment you provided.

The updated checklist is available in our GitHub repository under the filename `checklist_info.json`. Should you have any questions or require further details, please feel free to reach out.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Surbhi
